009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Translation2D;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
018import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
019import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
020import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
021
022/**
023 * <p>
024 * ImageJ plugin, applies a continuous translation to the current
025 * image. See Sec. 21.1.1 of [1] for details. Optionally opens a sample image if
026 * no image is currently open.
027 * </p>
028 * <p>
029 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
030 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
031 * </p>
032 * 
033 * @author WB
034 * @version 2022/11/28
035 * 
036 * @see ImageMapper
037 * @see Translation2D
038 */
039public class Map_Linear_Translate implements PlugInFilter {
040        
041        private static double dx = 5.25;
042        private static double dy = 7.3;
043        
044        /**
045         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
046         * is currently open.
047         */
048        public Map_Linear_Translate() {
049                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
050                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
051                }
052        }
053        
054    @Override
055        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
056        return DOES_ALL;
057    }
058
059    @Override
060        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
061
062                Translation2D imap = new Translation2D(dx, dy).getInverse();
063                new ImageMapper(imap, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic).map(ip);
064    }
065
066}
